Email Conversation Export

Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CH885QG_00
From: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Nancy Liu <nancy.liu@zimmermann.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-21 09:35
Subject: ZIM ME insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop, 

Could you please clarify, as of today for MOE or AD as an example, what of the below are currently covered by Allied ?

 

o            Products held within Chalhoub warehouses

o            All stores operating throughout the Middle East, including the stock held within

o            Inland transit and cargo covering stock distributed from Chalhoub warehouses to all stores operating in Middle East

o            General liability covering all locations in the Middle East

o            Local D&O

 

 

Thanks

Marco
